page.title: 12Education - Twyford Area
page.content: From the age of 3 until 5 children attend a Playgroup in either Marsh Gibbon or Steeple Claydon.From 5 until 9 children in Twyford attend the village school,the 30 children are divided into 2 classes.The headmistress and teacher travel from Aylesbury each day.Pounden children go to Marsh Gibbon from 5 until 9 and Godington children go to Bicester.From 9 until 12 Twyford and Pounden children travel to Grendon Underwood or Steeple Claydon.At 12 children in Twyford and Pounden have selective education.If they pass they can go to Grammar schools in Buckingham or Aylesbury;if not they go to Secondary schools in Buckingham,Waddesdon or Winslow.Godington children at age 11 go to Comprehensive in Bicester.At 16 Further Education is available and Night School at Buckingham and Winslow
